author: Max LeRoy
text: Gun ownership requires discipline, maturity, and responsibility. Most American adults couldn’t even wear a mask without throwing a temper tantrum. https://t.co/QCX7d3UBUS

author: Max LeRoy
text: RIP to all the souls lost at Virginia Tech 15 years ago today. And shout out to all the survivors whose lives have all been touched forever by this horrendous massacre. You are seen, your pain is valid & the people saying otherwise are disgusting.

author: Max LeRoy
text: This Is Me Then is an essential album. https://t.co/hQ3AJt6ImT

author: Max LeRoy
text: 10 years since this masterpiece was blessed upon us. The first adult show I watched regularly — and it still holds up! Thank you #DontTrustTheBinApt23 for being such an integral part of my coming of age! https://t.co/hGTH4BSHS5
